title.rendered: Basement & Ground Triplex | First & Second Floor | Third Floor With Terrace Garden In Anand Niketan | BOOKING

content.rendered:
Bookings Open in ANAND NIKETAN for this splendid, luxurious, five-star, and stylish development.
Call on 98183-12077 For Site Visit.

♕Plot Size – 950 yds
♕Rear Park
♕Wide Road
♕Excellent Location
♕A+ Specifications
♕Top Notch Interiors
♕Reputed Builder
♕Flexible Payment Terms

🏠Super splendid Basement & Ground Triplex
♕11000sqft | Separate Driveway For 7 cars | Exclusive Lift | Swimming Pool | Concierge | Home Theatre

🏠First Floor & Second Floor
♕4500sqft | Exclusive Lift | Separate Driveway For 4 cars | Modern Design | Private Lift Lobby

🏠Third Floor | Exclusive Lift | Separate Driveway For 4 cars | Modern Design | Private Lift Lobby With Thematically Landscape Terrace Garden, Gazebo, Swimming Pool, Open-Air Theatre, Waterfall, Expansive Pool, Jacuzzi, Gym, Pantry.

Anand Niketan is one of the most preferred areas for Expatriates, Diplomats, Beurocrats, Businessmen, and Industrialists. Anand Niketan is also in close proximity to Airport & Chanakyapuri which has an Embassy cluster, American and British schools, and luxury hotels like Taj & ITC Maurya.

Lalit Kaushik

Call On 98183-12077 For More Information

http://wa.me/919818312077

Follow @royalerealtorsindia on social media
Checkout Our Other Listings Here
ROYALE REALTORS INDIA

Royale Realtors India – Luxury Real Estate

19 DDA Market, Shanti Niketan, New Delhi, Delhi 110021
